action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The outer border is filled with X's, creating a frame. Inside this frame, there is an alternating pattern of X's and blank spaces (represented by ▢). Starting from the top left corner inside the frame, there is an X, followed by a blank space, then an X, another blank space, and finally an X to complete the row. This pattern is repeated for the three rows within the frame, so that the X's form a cross shape in the center of the grid, with the blank spaces at the four corners inside the frame.
continue
